title.rendered: Anker iPhone Charging Cable, PowerLine II Lightning Cable (6ft / 1.8m), Probably The World’s Most Durable Cable, MFi…

content.rendered:
Positive Reinforcement

Using a specialist, bulletproof fiber, PowerLine II might be the strongest cable on the planet. Over 40% stronger than the earlier PowerLine mannequin—a cable famend for its sturdiness

Benchmark Durability

Designed to tolerate over 12,000 bends—that’s 12x greater than a regular Lightning cable. Twists, yanks and drops pose no risk for a cable this sturdy.

Beautiful Inside & Out

A high-quality TPE end gives a tactile and sturdy exterior. Able to withstand filth and preserve an ‘as-new’ look for for much longer than different supplies. Give your iPhone the accomplice it deserves.

High-Speed Charging

Charging and data-transfer speeds keep sky-high. PowerLine II is confirmed by Apple themselves to supply the very best attainable efficiency for your gadgets.

Read more

PowerLine II A-to-Lightning Premium Nylon A-to-Lightning PowerLine III A-to-Lightning Premium Nylon A-to-Lightning PowerLine II USB-C to Lightning Cable New Nylon USB-C to Lightning Cable
Length 6ft 6ft 6ft 6ft [2-Pack] 6ft 6ft
Bend Lifespan 12000+ 12000+ 25000+ 12000+ 12000+ 12000+
Material Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Nylon braided exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Nylon braided exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Double-braided nylon exterior
MFi Certified ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Model Number: A8433

PowerLine II Lightning Cable

The Cable That’s Yours For Life

From Strength to Strength

PowerLine II tolerates being bent over 12,000 occasions, lasting an infinite 12x longer than different Lightning cables.

Certified Compatibility

MFi certification means whole peace of thoughts as a result of PowerLine II is totally Apple licensed. Designed to work flawlessly with iPhone, iPad, iPod or any system with a Lightning port.

Lasts a Lifetime

To present our perception in PowerLine II Lightning Cable, we’re providing a hassle-free substitute for all high quality points. Not for half a yr, not for 18 months, however for a complete lifetime. It stands out as the final cable you’ll ever want to purchase.

Compatible With

iPhone 11 / X / XS / XR / XS Max / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5

iPad Pro / Air / Air 2

iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4

iPad (eighth era)

iPod nano (seventh era)

iPod contact (fifth era)

AirPods and AirPods with Wireless Charging Case.

Make positive this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
Strength In Numbers: Extreme reinforcement ensures inside wiring is protected to maintain telephones charging—capable of help over 175lb (80kg).
Ultimate Durability: Lasts 12x longer than different cables and confirmed to face up to over 12,000 bends in strict laboratory exams.
Charge Fast: MFi certification and strict high quality testing guarantee your Apple gadgets are charged safely, at their quickest attainable pace.
A Cable for Life: We’re so assured about Powerline II’s long-lasting efficiency that we gave it a hassle-free, lifetime guarantee.
What You Get: Anker PowerLine II (6ft together with each ends), a hassle-free lifetime guarantee and pleasant customer support.
